intro.title: Welcome to the Symphony of Voices page!
intro.msg:
Hey there! Welcome to the landing page for Symphony of Voices.

Symphony of Voices is the Victoria Junior College Choir's annual concert, held usually at the end of the J2 batch's stint in choir. Each concert has its own theme, with a variety of songs associated with the theme being sung in the concert, usually in the second half.

This part of the website contains information for each Symphony of Voices, with their repertoire and recordings stored and available for download here.

sov.title: Symphony of Voices 2019
sov.intro:
Symphony of Voices 2019 was held at the Esplanade Concert Hall on the 22nd of May, 2019.
The theme for this year was A World Where Roses Bloom.

repertoire.name: Two Lenten Motets (Memento Mei, Domine and Crucem Tuam Adoramus, Domine)
O My Love Is Like A Red, Red Rose
repertoire.mp3: 9 O My Love Is Like A Red, Red Rose

repertoire.name: 可爱的玫瑰花
repertoire.mp3: 14 Ke Ai De Mei Gui Hua

repertoire.name: 玫瑰玫瑰我爱你
repertoire.mp3: 15 Mei Gui Mei Gui Wo Ai Ni

repertoire.name: Red Roses for a Blue Lady
repertoire.composer: Sid Tepper, Roy C. Bennett (arr. Ralph Hunter)
repertoire.mp3: 16 Red Roses for a Blue Lady

yt.desc: The entire SOV2019 playlist has been uploaded to YouTube for everyone to watch.

dls.intro: Audio for this particular SOV is available for download in the following sections. If any of these links go down, please drop us a message so that we can rectify the problem ASAP. Thank you! :)

sov.title: Symphony of Voices 2010
sov.intro:
Symphony of Voices 2010 was held on the 11th of May, 2010 at the Esplanade Concert Hall.
The theme for this year was Masquerade.
Note: for this year there wasn't really a specific theme, but instead the concert was divided into a few different sections. You can take a look at the booklet for more information in the Google Drive.
